messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Enigmatic Easel Heist DATE: 09/12/48 The courtroom buzzed with anticipation as the trial commenced. The prosecution began by calling the officers involved in the investigation to the stand. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Johnson, the lead investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Lieutenant Johnson. Can you explain the sequence of events on the night of the heist? WITNESS: Of course. On the night of April 23rd, Officer C. D. Kent reported a break-in at the city's esteemed art gallery. We immediately started an investigation. PROSECUTOR: Who was in charge of the forensic examination? WITNESS: That would be Criminalist E. F. Lewis and Technician G. H. Martin. PROSECUTOR: And who conducted the interviews with the gallery staff and potential witnesses? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Nelson and K. L. O’Malley were assigned to the interrogations. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense then cross-examined Lieutenant Johnson regarding the police procedures followed during the investigation. During the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Powell, O. P. Quinn, and R. S. Rogers were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
